verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: thanked] [ARG1: North Korea 's Kim Jong Un] [ARG2: for releasing three Americans from captivity] , [ARGM-ADV: saying he believes Kim wants to reach an agreement on denuclearizing the Korean peninsula] .
